desc: At Fatima Silver Creation we specialize in Sterling Silver, Semiprecious Stones and Customer Satisfaction! We are not on the road this summer, but look forward to traveling in the future. Please see our winter collections and holiday sales. We look forward to hearing your thoughts on our new venture. Happy Holidays

layout.text: A Personal Touch When Shopping For Timeless Pieces To Accentuate And Highlight Your Best Looks.
